AC6 is specialized in embedded, real-time systems and Linux. We provide a full range of high-quality trainings with over 150 courses (hardware and sof...

Ac6

AC6 is specialized in embedded, real-time systems and Linux. We provide a full range of high-quality trainings with over 150 courses (hardware and software). AC6 also provides engineering, consulting and expertise. Our engineers can enhance, optimize existing products or develop new ones and ensuring the security of your application. We have developed two IDEs SW4STM32 et SW4Linux.

In the field of custom development, we cooperate, among others, with leading companies in the development and production of semiconductors. We started our cooperation based on our many years of experience with embedded systems and other areas of development, including the safety critical applications.

Ashling

Ashling’s RiscFree™ SDK has become synonymous with the embedded market with over 30 years of tools experience resulting in a comprehensive SDK which includes an IDE, Debugger, Compiler, Debug & Trace Probes for RISC-V & Arm development with support for customisation & multi-core, heterogeneous environments. Did we mention we also offer Zephyr support including a debug plug-in ? Be sure to check us out!

BayLibre is an embedded software engineering firm focused on open source, low level software development. Our customers are the tastemakers in the sem...

BayLibre

BayLibre is an embedded software engineering firm focused on open source, low level software development. Our customers are the tastemakers in the semiconductor, consumer electronics, enterprise & industrial IoT industries. In addition to our upstream contributions to Linux and Android, BayLibre has been a community contributor to Zephyr since 2016, porting the RTOS to the STM32L4 platform and presenting on the topic at ELC 2017. Since then we have made major contributions to make Zephyr 64-bit compatible and SMP capable, along with architecture ports to RISC-V RV64 and ARM AARCH64 ISAs.

Beechwoods Software is a leader in IoT interoperability with deep-domain knowledge of embedded, resource-constrained devices. Beechwoods’ multinational team of experts produces advanced software and helps bring high quality, innovative products to market. Since 2005, our team has deployed software on over tens of millions of connected devices.

Bluenetics GmbH

We offer high quality software development services for embedded applications based on clean architectures and test driven develoment. We have long-term experience in Bluetooth low energy and Bluetooth mesh applications on Nordic processors based on Zephyr RTOS. Our strategic focus targets low energy wireless communication and BLE/MATTER mesh networks.

Blynk IoT

With Blynk’s IoT software platform embedded developers can easily add advanced connectivity, device/user management, OTA firmware updates and feature-rich no-code mobile apps to their products. Cloud infrastructure and storage included. Blynk excels in scaling IoT projects from initial prototypes to full-blown commercial operations with thousands of devices, significantly reducing time-to-market thanks to its extensive suite of pre-built functionalities.

Over 900,000 developers globally are building IoT solutions with Blynk.

Cactus engineering

Cactus is a leading tech engineering firm specializing in sustainable software/hardware solutions, developing IoT and AI projects with top-quality standards.

At Cactus, we’re more than just an IT engineering company. We’re a symbol of change and innovation. Our mission is to transform IT development into an ecological and socially responsible solution.

Our Core Values: Innovation. Honesty. Sustainability. Resilience. The world needs these values. Technology does too.

What We Offer:

Customer-Centric Modular IoT Technology: We attend to your specific needs efficiently.

Multidisciplinary Expertise: With over 15 years of experience in software and hardware development.

End-to-End Electronic Solutions: Covering the entire IoT market, including Healthcare, Energy, Agriculture, Finance,

Manufacturing, Retail, Hospitality, Transportation, and Logistics.

Continuous Delivery: Our work methodology ensures we evolve with the ever-changing tech landscape.

Our Specializations

Connectivity: WLAN, BLE, LoRa, 5G, and more.

Power Management: Ultra-low power consumption solutions.

Artificial Intelligence: Machine learning at its finest.

Sensing: Monitoring everything from water to temperature, pressure, humidity, and more.

Cloud Architectures: Secure and distributed cloud solutions.

App and Web Development: Designed for your unique needs.

Saving Energy, Saving Costs: We’re passionate about efficiency, designing solutions that reduce resource consumption, save you money, and contribute to a more sustainable world.

The essential choice for independent training to over 5,400 companies spanning 84 countries, Doulos provides scheduled classes and bespoke team training both In-Person and Live Online. ElFaro LAB SL

With 20 years of experience, we design technological products taking care of requirements and desired features, prototyping and manufacturing.

Our daily job is investigation, discover, research and development of new technologies. You can benefit from our expertise if you are in need of innovation, if you need original ideas. We are skilled electronic engineers, multi-language developers, inventors, circuit designers.

Our work ranges from designing space-grade electronics, deploying and managing large-scale data networks of custom IoT sensors to autonomous robotics with AI.

Ezurio turns design possibility into reality with a comprehensive range of RF modules, system-on-modules, single board computers, internal antennas, IoT devices, and custom solutions. Our global reach and unmatched support are backed by a resilient global supply chain that gives our customers the stability to overcome every design challenge with confidence. Turn design possibility into reality with Ezurio, your connectivity expert.

Grandcentrix is a wholly owned subsidiary of Vodafone – one of the world leaders in the IoT market. The company is built on two pillars: as a produc...

grandcentrix

Grandcentrix is a wholly owned subsidiary of Vodafone – one of the world leaders in the IoT market.

The company is built on two pillars: as a product house, grandcentrix specializes in developing cutting-edge plug & work IoT products that incorporate future-proof technologies. Using cellular connectivity, they make it easier to connect things and create impact in a resource-efficient way.

As a solutions provider, the company also offers bespoke, end-to-end IoT development services.

Grandcentrix makes IoT happen.

JetBrains

JetBrains creates intelligent software development tools used by over 15 million professionals and 90 Fortune Global Top100 companies. Its lineup of more than 30 products includes IDEs for most programming languages and technologies, such as IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, and others, as well as products for team collaboration, like JetBrains Space. JetBrains is also known for creating the Kotlin programming language, recognized by Google as the preferred language for Android development.

Memfault

Memfault’s cloud-based firmware delivery, monitoring, and analytics tools dramatically reduce engineering and support overhead, enabling companies to ship and manage IoT devices at scale. Memfault helps you reduce risk, ship products faster, and resolve issues right away with fleet monitoring, cloud debugging, and controlled OTA firmware updates. Zephyr RTOS users can get up and running in minutes with Memfault enabling real-time diagnostics for fleets of connected devices.

Nordic Semiconductor is a fabless semiconductor company specializing in ultra-low power wireless solutions for the IoT. We ship more than one million ...

Nordic Semiconductor

Nordic Semiconductor is a fabless semiconductor company specializing in ultra-low power wireless solutions for the IoT. We ship more than one million Bluetooth Low Energy SoCs every day. Our multiprotocol SoCs support the Bluetooth mesh, Matter, Thread and Zigbee protocols, and these can run concurrently with Bluetooth Low Energy. We also offer the most compact and low power cellular IoT solution available in the market, supporting the low power cellular protocols LTE-M and NB-IoT, in addition to GPS.

Percepio

Percepio provides visual trace diagnostics for embedded and IoT systems in development and in the field. Percepio Tracealyzer combines software tracing with powerful visualizations, allowing users to spot and analyze issues in software recordings. Percepio DevAlert is a cloud service for monitoring deployed IoT devices, combining real-time error reporting with Tracealyzer visualizations.

Teslabs Engineering

Teslabs Engineering is an embedded software and electrical engineering firm focused on open source, low-level software and electronics development. Our customers include semiconductor companies, consumer electronics and industrial IoT. We have been contributing regularly to Zephyr, adding support for new SoCs or drivers. We have also developed open-source demo applications using Zephyr, e.g. hard real-time motor control.
